org.apache.abdera2.activities.model
Class IO

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.abdera2.activities.model.IO
Direct Known Subclasses:
GsonIO
public abstract class IO
extends Object

Primary interface for serializing/deserializing Activity objects. Instances of IO are threadsafe.
